metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6111 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
gnome-keyring does not discard stored secrets when usinggnome_keyring_lock_all_sync function

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6111` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnome-keyring - 3.18.3-0ubuntu2
libp11-kit-gnome-keyring - 3.18.3-0ubuntu2
libpam-gnome-keyring - 3.18.3-0ubuntu2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gnome-keyring package in esm-infra/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.18.3-0ubuntu2').
